title: Yasutaka Yoshida
text:
is a former <a href="Japan">Japan</a>ese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Playing career.
Yoshida was born in <a href="Hiroshima%20Prefecture">Hiroshima Prefecture</a> on November 22, 1966. After graduating from <a href="Tokai%20University">Tokai University</a>, he joined <a href="Tanabe%20Mitsubishi%20Pharma%20SC">Tanabe Pharmaceutical</a> in 1989. He played many matches as defender from first season. In 1991, he moved to his local club <a href="Sanfrecce%20Hiroshima">Mazda</a> (later "Sanfrecce Hiroshima"). However he could not play many matches and he moved to <a href="Japan%20Football%20League%20%281992%E2%80%9398%29">Japan Football League</a> club <a href="Cosmo%20Oil%20Yokkaichi%20FC">Cosmo Oil</a> (later "Cosmo Oil Yokkaichi") in 1995. Although he played as regular player, the club was disbanded end of 1996 season and he retired end of 1996 season.
